moves.3... Ng4 4. Bf4: normally here will be played Nf3.
moves.4... Nc6 5. Nf3 Bb4+: White can also place the Knight at c3, then the mate doesn't come.
moves.6. Nbd2 Qe7 7. a3: White thinks, the binding of the Knight isn't nice, he will get the Bishop.
moves.7... Ncxe5: Black leaves the Bishop, but White can not take the Bishop, because then is a mate with Nd3#!
moves.8. axb4 Nd3#: Checkmate (White can not take the Knight, because the queen is on the line with the king (she will give check, when the pawn takes the Knight.
